name: Premier Micronutrient Corporation
overview: Premier Micronutrient Corporation (PMC) develops and markets scientifically researched, customized formulations of natural vitamins, minerals and antioxidant supplements, also known as micronutrients. These custom formulations, which are the product of over 25 years of scientific and medical research, are used to enhance the treatment of such diseases as cancer, cardiovascular disease, diabetes, Alzheimer’s disease and radiation exposure and the promotion of optimal health. The goal of PMC is to protect the human body through the use of micronutrient supplementation. PMC was founded in 2000 by Kedar N. Prasad, Ph.D., William C. Cole, Ph.D., and Gerald M. Haase, M.D. The company headquarters is located in Nashville, Tennessee with the Clinical Programs Center in Denver, Colorado and the Antioxidant Research Institute in Novato, California. PMC is a wholly owned subsidiary of PMC Holdings, Inc.
